product_name: The Dixie Cragger's Atlas: Climber's Guide to Tennessee - Volume II
long_description: Volume II of. Author: Chris Watford. Softcover, 280 pages. Market Place Press; copyright 2013. . Also includes Starr Mountain, King's Bluff, Black Mountain, Fall Creek Falls, Savage Gulf, Devil's Racetrack and Obed/Lilly's Bluff. Provides hundreds of new routes in existing areas and clear, concise descriptions.
short_description: Volume II of The Dixie Cragger's Atlas: Climber's Guide to Tennessee offers comprehensive information on the best climbing in the state.
